https://openminds.om-i.org/props/criteri._instruction: Add the protocol execution defining the criteria that were applied to determine this relation.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/criteri.description: Aspects or standards on which a judgement or decision is based.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/criteri.label: Criteria
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/criteri.name: criteria

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/inRelat._instruction: Add the anatomical entity to which the relation is described.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/inRelat.label: In relation to
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/inRelat.name: inRelationTo

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/qualita._instruction: Add the qualitative overlap that best describes the relation between the two anatomical entities.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/qualita.description: Semantic characterization of how much two things occupy the same space.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/qualita.label: Qualitative overlap
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/qualita.name: qualitativeOverlap
